channel.title: Server Runtime Manager 1.7
channel.description:
[B][size=25pt]Server Runtime Manager 1.7[/size][/B] Post what you think! [b]Download : [url=http://uppit.com/V0S5I3]UPPIT[/url][/b] [B]Video Preview: (v1.4 Video)[/B] [url=http://uppit.com/QZ1TLU]http://uppit.com/QZ1TLU[/url] Features: -Compile and Run your server without the need of batch files. -Hide the java.exe Console. -Capture your Server and Compiler output into the Programs Built in Terminal. -Crash Detection (Completely Re-Writen Since Last Version) -Easily set up a server without having the edit tons of batch files -Nearly Instant Restart -Does'nt need to stay with your source files -Helps keep server up 24/7 -Turn On/Off Auto-Restarter -Tooltips -Start up your Preferred Client With the click of a Button. -No Client Console to deal With. -Restart your server from a separate computer (Remote Management) -Some other Misc Features. New Features: -Deleted the Connections Tab (created many unreproducible errors) -Fixed some bugs. Running Server: [IMG]http://img28.picoodle.com/img/img28/4/7/15/f_17m_809f8a8.jpg[/img] Remote Management: [img]http://img26.picoodle.com/img/img26/4/7/15/f_18m_c5bd3cc.jpg[/img] Settings: [IMG]http://img28.picoodle.com/img/img28/4/7/15/f_19m_bdcb4b7.jpg[/img] Should you ever receive this error, you need to install .NET Frameworks 2.0
The application failed to initialize properly (0xc0000135). Click on OK to terminate the application...
(This comes standard on allot of computers) [b]You will need .NET Frameworks 2.0 to use Download them here: [/b][url=http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyID=0856EACB-4362-4B0D-8EDD-AAB15C5E04F5&displaylang=en]CLICK ME[/url] [b]Previous Versions:[/b] V1.6 Download: [b][url=http://uppit.com/D82H0LO]UPPIT[/url][/b] V1.5 Download: [b][url=http://uppit.com/4EENGT]UPPIT[/url][/b] V1.4 Download: [b][url=http://rapidshare.de/files/39757553/Server_Runtime_Manager_v1.4.rar.html]Rapidshare.de[/url][/b] V1.3 Download: [b][url=http://uppit.com/K464ZT]UPPIT[/url][/b] V1.2 Download: [b][url=http://uppit.com/JZZT4U]UPPIT[/url][/b] V1.1 Download: [b][url=http://uppit.com/RHK3IE]UPPIT[/url][/b] If this is in the wrong secion, please notify me of the correct one so I can move it.

item.title: Server Runtime Manager 1.7
item.dc:creator: @meiscooldude meiscooldude
item.description:
@meiscooldude wrote:

[size=25pt]Server Runtime Manager 1.7[/size]

Post what you think!

Download : UPPIT

Video Preview: (v1.4 Video)
http://uppit.com/QZ1TLU

Features:
-Compile and Run your server without the need of batch files.
-Hide the java.exe Console.
-Capture your Server and Compiler output into the Programs Built in Terminal.
-Crash Detection (Completely Re-Writen Since Last Version)
-Easily set up a server without having the edit tons of batch files
-Nearly Instant Restart
-Does’nt need to stay with your source files
-Helps keep server up 24/7
-Turn On/Off Auto-Restarter
-Tooltips
-Start up your Preferred Client With the click of a Button.
-No Client Console to deal With.
-Restart your server from a separate computer (Remote Management)
-Some other Misc Features.

New Features:
-Deleted the Connections Tab (created many unreproducible errors)
-Fixed some bugs.

Running Server:

Remote Management:

Settings:

Should you ever receive this error, you need to install .NET Frameworks 2.0

The application failed to initialize properly (0xc0000135). Click on OK to terminate the application...

(This comes standard on allot of computers)
You will need .NET Frameworks 2.0 to use
Download them here: CLICK ME
